inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: clinical diagnosis with D-dimer > 100% and/or serum creatinine >25%

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosis within 90 days prior to enrollment

exclusion.criterion: hypersensitivity to murine proteins or excipients of ravulizumab
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of vaccination with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine, but this is not relevant to the trial. The genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%, which suggests that the patient's condition may be related to atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
